oracle.kubernetes.operator

Interface DomainProcessorDelegate


  • public interface DomainProcessorDelegate
    A set of underlying services required during domain processing.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      FiberGate createFiberGate()
      Creates a new FiberGate.
      String getOperatorNamespace()
      Returns the namespace associated with the operator itself.
      PodAwaiterStepFactory getPodAwaiterStepFactory(String namespace)
      Returns a factory that creates a step to wait for a pod in the specified namespace to be ready.
      KubernetesVersion getVersion()
      Returns the version of the Kubernetes environment in which the operator is running
      boolean isNamespaceRunning(String namespace)
      Returns true if the namespace is running.
      void runSteps(Step firstStep)
      Runs a chain of steps
      ScheduledFuture<?> scheduleWithFixedDelay(Runnable command, long initialDelay, long delay, TimeUnit unit)
      Schedules the specified command to run periodically.

    • Method Detail

      • getOperatorNamespace

        String getOperatorNamespace()
        Returns the namespace associated with the operator itself.
        Returns:
        a namespace string

      • getPodAwaiterStepFactory

        PodAwaiterStepFactory getPodAwaiterStepFactory(String namespace)
        Returns a factory that creates a step to wait for a pod in the specified namespace to be ready.
        Parameters:
        namespace - the namespace for the pod
        Returns:
        a step-creating factory

      • isNamespaceRunning

        boolean isNamespaceRunning(String namespace)
        Returns true if the namespace is running.
        Parameters:
        namespace - the namespace to check
        Returns:
        the 'running' state of the namespace

      • getVersion

        KubernetesVersion getVersion()
        Returns the version of the Kubernetes environment in which the operator is running
        Returns:
        an object that represents the Kubernetes version

      • createFiberGate

        FiberGate createFiberGate()
        Creates a new FiberGate.
        Returns:
        the created instance

      • runSteps

        void runSteps(Step firstStep)
        Runs a chain of steps
        Parameters:
        firstStep - the first step to run

      • scheduleWithFixedDelay

        ScheduledFuture<?> scheduleWithFixedDelay(Runnable command,
                                          long initialDelay,
                                          long delay,
                                          TimeUnit unit)
        Schedules the specified command to run periodically.
        Parameters:
        command - the command to run
        initialDelay - the number of time units to wait before running the command the first time
        delay - the number of time units to delay between successive runs
        unit - the time unit for the above delays
        Returns:
        a future which indicates completion of the command
